page.title: 12CLUB DAY
page.content: EVERY YEAR ON THE THIRD SATURDAY IN JULY THE SUNDAY SCHOOL ORGANISATIONS ARRANGE A FESTIVAL WHICH TAKES THE FORM OF A PROCESSION AROUND THE TOWN OF LEEK. ALL THE CHILDREN WHO ATTEND SUNDAY SCHOOL DRESS UP,FORM INTO GROUPS CARRYING BANNERS GIVING THE NAME OF THEIR CHURCH OR CHAPEL, AND PROCEED TO WALK AROUND LEEK ENDING THE WALK IN THE MARKET SQUARE WHERE HYMN SINGING TAKES PLACE. AFTERWARDS THE CHILDREN RETURN TO THEIR CHURCH WHERE THEY HAVE A SPECIAL TEA. EACH GROUP TAKE IT IN TURN TO LEAD THE PROCESSION AND ALL THE RELIGIOUS ORGANISATIONS FROM IN AND AROUND LEEK TAKE PART. IT IS THOUGHT TO BE QUITE A UNIQUE EVENT AND GOES BACK MANY YEARS.
